description:
This content features an additional BGM pack with BGM tracks of past Atelier series titles.
Titles featured:

- Atelier Marie
- Atelier Elie
- Atelier Lilie
- Atelier Judie
- Atelier Viorate
- Atelier Iris: Eternal Mana
- Atelier Iris 2: The Azoth of Destiny
- Atelier Iris 3: Grand Phantasm
- Mana Khemia
- Mana Khemia 2
- Atelier Totori
- Atelier Meruru
- Atelier Ayesha
- Atelier Escha & Logy
- Atelier Shallie
- Atelier Sophie
- Atelier Firis
- Atelier Lise
- Atelier Annie
- Atelier Lina
- Atelier Marie, Elie, & Anis
- Marie & Elie ~Our Atelier~
- Hermina & Culus
name: Atelier Series Legacy BGM Pack
